title: Life Worth Living (CRS012)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A harrowing story that Nancy Sullivan first shared on RISK! in October of 2011 about child molestation and a family in denial.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Nancy Sullivan, Kevin Allison)
